title: Being a Godly Husband
itunes:author: Guests: Pastor Craig Groeschel.
itunes:summary:
As a husband, it's critically important to lead your wife and children toward God. But the big question is, how? Greg and John give advice for leading your family spiritually, and Erin talks about how she's learned to encourage her husband in his role. Featuring Pastor Craig Groeschel.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY
